full_description:
HONOR Pad 8 6GB RAM 128GB Storage 12-inch Tablet

The HONOR Pad 8 is a 12-inch tablet that comes with a 2K HONOR FullView Display and eight large cavity speakers for rich visuals and audio. It has a sleek metal unibody design with a slim 6.9mm profile for a comfortable hold. The tablet is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 octa-core processor with 4x A73 cores running at 2.4GHz and 4x A53 cores running at 1.9GHz. It operates on Android S with MagicUI 6.1, offering a powerful and efficient performance for seamless multitasking and a smooth user experience. The Tab is equipped with a powerful 7,250mAh battery and supports fast charging.

12-Inch 2K Eye Protection HONOR Fullview Display

The HONOR Pad 8 has a 12-inch 2K HONOR FullView Display. With a screen-to-body ratio of up to 87%, it provides flagship-level visual enjoyment that is ideal for watching movies, playing games, or immersing yourself in your favorite content. The narrow bezels and high-resolution display bring your media to life, making every moment a visual treat.

Eight Large Cavity Speakers for Immersive Audio

The HONOR Pad 8 is equipped with eight large cavity speakers that produce a symphony of sound. The tablet provides a stereo surround sound range that enhances your audio experience by combining 4 treble and 4 bass professional audio units. The DTS:X Ultra + HONOR Histen audio adjustment ensures a superior listening experience whether you're listening to music, participating in online meetings, or watching videos.

Multi-Screen Collaboration

HONOR Pad 8 lets you enjoy the ease of multi-screen collaboration. The N Serie's first tablet to support this ground-breaking function is this one. You can easily drag and drop pictures and videos by interacting with your smartphone on the same screen. Experience the seamless collaboration between your mobile phone and tablet as you work together on files and projects.

Smart Multi-Window

The HONOR Pad 8 allows you to work on everything you need at once by supporting up to four open app windows simultaneously. The tablet makes multitasking simple by allowing you to display up to four windows at once. You can easily switch between apps thanks to the split-screen navigation bar, which facilitates multitasking. Your workflow will be seamless thanks to the desktop cards and large folder feature, which make it simple to access your files.

Ultra-Full Eye Protection

The HONOR Pad 8 puts eye health first. It has dual eye protection without strobes and hardware-level low blue light certification from TÜV Rheinland. The tablet has numerous software-level eye protection modes, including eBook mode and dark mode, in addition to the hardware protection. Your eyes are well-protected for prolonged use, regardless of whether you're reading an eBook or working in low light.

Fast Charge & Large Battery

The HONOR Pad 8 is powered by a large 7,250mAh battery. With 22.5W fast charging capabilities, you can quickly charge your device and get back to your tasks without any compromise. Enjoy up to 14 hours of listening to audiobooks or watching offline self-study videos on a bright screen. For online classes, the tablet offers up to 10 hours of continuous usage, keeping you connected and productive.

Metal Unibody Design

The HONOR Pad 8 has a metal unibody that reflects style and toughness. It feels safe and secure in your hands thanks to its thin 6.9mm body and delicate matte texture. It's surprisingly light and portable, weighing only 520g, making it the perfect travel companion.

Honor Pad X9 4GB RAM 128GB Storage 11.5-inch Tablet

The Honor Pad X9 tablet has a wide and smooth display, a strong processor, and a long battery life. It has an 11.5-inch TFT LCD screen with a resolution of 1200 x 2000 pixels and a refresh rate of 120Hz, which provides a crisp and smooth viewing experience. It is similarly space-gray in color and has a sleek design. It is powered by an octa-core Snapdragon 685(6 nm) CPU and an Adreno 610 GPU, both of which are capable of handling multitasking and gaming. It also includes 6 GB of RAM and 128 GB of internal storage, which can be upgraded with a microSD card up to 512 GB. Honor Pad X9 4GB RAM 128GB Storage 11.5-inch Tablet offers a dual camera arrangement, with a 5 MP back camera and a 5 MP front camera, both of which are capable of capturing high-quality images and movies. It also comes with a 7250 mAh battery that can power up to 12 hours of movie playback or web surfing. It also has quick charging and reverse charging capabilities. It is powered by Android 10 and has the Magic UI 4.0 skin. It also features Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, USB Type-C, and a headphone port for communication. The Honor Pad X9 tablet is great for anybody looking for a wide and smooth display, robust performance, and a long battery life.
